page.title: 10Irvine Meadow Football Club
page.content: In 1895,{Irvine Meadow X1 F.C.}was formed.On their books they have 17 players who are both{amateur}and{ {professional.}The youngest players are 18 and the oldest 33. In a year, they play 50-60 games with around 150 spectators.The{entrance fees}are 60p for adults and 30p for children and old age pensioners.To run the club the team needs Â£4000 a year.The money the spectators pay does not cover this but the club has ways of making money like raffles and beetle drives etc. They take part in seven competitions:{the {Ayrshire League, the Scarlett Trophy, {the Scottish Cup, the West of Scotland {Cup, the Cunningham District Cup and {the Drybrough Cup.}So far they have won the Ayrshire Cup and they are in the semi-finals of the Drybrough Cup. The club has no hooliganism at games. { }
